BGP-4 MIB Implementation Survey

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This document provides a survey of implementations of BGP-4 that support RFC 1657 MIB agents according to the BGP-4 v1 MIB specification.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档概述了根据BGP-4 v1 MIB规范支持RFC 1657 MIB代理的BGP-4实现。

contents.text: Table of Contents
contents.zh-CHS: 目录

contents.text: 1. Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 介绍

contents.text: This document provides a survey of BGP-4 v1 MIB [RFC4274] implementations. After a brief summary, each response is listed. The authors make no claim as to the accuracy of the information provided.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档概述了BGP-4 v1 MIB[RFC4274]的实现。在简要总结之后，将列出每个响应。提交人对所提供的资料的准确性没有提出任何要求。

contents.text: The following organizations reported having BGP-4 MIB implementations: Cisco Systems, Redback Networks, and NextHop Technologies.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下组织报告了BGP-4 MIB的实施：Cisco Systems、Redback Networks和NextHop Technologies。

contents.text: 2. Survey Summary
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 调查摘要

contents.text: This survey asked for information about the implementations of the BGP-4 [RFC4271] that support MIB agents [RFC1657] according to the BGP-4 v1 MIB [RFC4274].
contents.zh-CHS: 这项调查要求了解根据BGP-4 v1 MIB[RFC4274]支持MIB代理[RFC1657]的BGP-4[RFC4271]的实现情况。

contents.text: Two or more of the implementations of BGP-4 v1 MIB [RFC4274] each implement all the objects. None of the implementations that responded to the survey implemented the read-write variables (Section 2.2). The two TRAPs as specified are not implemented by two implementations (Section 2.3). The counters' initialized state is zeroed in all implementations, but a reset peer is only reset by the Redback implementation (Section 2.4).
contents.zh-CHS: BGP-4 v1 MIB[RFC4274]的两个或多个实现都实现了所有对象。响应调查的实施方案中没有一个实现了读写变量（第2.2节）。指定的两个陷阱不是由两个实现实现的（第2.3节）。计数器的初始化状态在所有实现中均为零，但重置对等点仅由Redback实现重置（第2.4节）。

contents.text: There are 3 agent implementations for the 3 surveyed (Section 2.5). The Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) managers used to test the implementations are: Net-SNMP (www.net-snmp.org), Multi Router Traffic Grapher (www.mrtg.org), and the internal Cisco manager.
contents.zh-CHS: 调查的3个项目共有3个代理实施（第2.5节）。用于测试实现的简单网络管理协议（SNMP）管理器包括：网络SNMP（www.Net-SNMP.org）、多路由器流量记录器（www.mrtg.org）和内部Cisco管理器。

contents.text: No interoperability issues related to the Manager specification were found.
contents.zh-CHS: 未发现与Manager规范相关的互操作性问题。

contents.text: The first was "Do you initialize these counters to zero?", and the second was "Do you reset these counters to zero when a configured peer enter the established state?"
